Translations.Text: Non abuse oaths vos lest vos slide back habet strong foothold tunc vos incur misery! Such est consequence de repelling ex path DEUS setting malus example vos incur terrible retribution
Non sell tuus oaths short DEUS! Quod DEUS possesses est far bene vos si vos unus knew
quod vos possess runs out quod DEUS possesses extremum forever Nos surely reward those qui steadfastly persevere nos recompense them their righteous works
Anyone works righteousness vir femina dum believing nos surely grant them happy vita in hoc saeculum nos surely pay them their foderator recompense Feria Judgment their righteous works
When vos read Quran vos seek refuge DEUS ex Satan the rejected
He non habet power over those believe trust their Dominus
His power limited those choose eum prout their magister those qui choose eum their deus
